entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
